Text: Hi MKVGuy :) I noticed you also like small size mkv rips..actually,Im sharing with everybody my rip parameters,because I think it is fare for everybody to know how to do it yourself..so I would like to ask you,if you could share your rip parameters too,so we could improve further the quality of next uploads..and hopefully let new enthusiastic uploaders join TPB too.. ;) what do you think?
